section.name: Unit 4. Optimizing Learning for Adult English Learners
section.summary:
Welcome to Unit 4: Optimizing Learning for Adult English Learners. In this unit, we explore classroom management practices that optimize learning for adult ELs, including maximizing student interaction and engagement, class routines, modeling and demonstrating class activities, and managing your level of language as a teacher. We also look at ways to differentiate instruction to meet the varying needs of learners in your classes. â€‹

To get started, download these documents for use in Unit 4:

  • Pause and Think Handout
  • Video Observation Task: Effective Grouping Strategies

To complete the unit, view the video for Unit 4. Then, complete an extended practice activity on differentiating instruction.
